About Me
Passionate about web and software development, I enjoy creating web applications and am looking forward to a career of improving my skills and following the latest trends and technologies of the industry.
After two years working for a startup company in Tokyo, I plan to return to Australia and further my career there. I hope to utilise my experience to collaborate with people and help produce good quality web applications.
Qualifications:
Bachelor Of Computer Science Japanese Proficiency Language Certificate N1
Experience working with:
PHP Javascript HTML CSS
